channel.title: Explosives
channel.description:
Can you make an explosive from everyday material? if so, show us how and post it. Or take a video of yourself doing it and post it.
I make Molotov cocktails once or twice on occasion. the occasion either being the 4th of July or new years eve. Basically, put some petrol in a beer or soda bottle, put a handkerchief inside light it and throw it.

item.title: Explosives
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

B2300 T4nk:

Get a bottle, put gasoline in it, put a strand of paper and you’ve got yourself a bomb.

Hey that’s my idea! >:(

Read full topic

item.title: Explosives
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

1993 World Trade Center bombing

The 1993 World Trade Center bombing was a terrorist attack on the World Trade Center, carried out on February 26, 1993, when a truck bomb detonated below the North Tower of the World Trade Center in New York City. The 1,336 pounds (606 kg) urea nitrate–hydrogen gas enhanced device was intended to send the North Tower (Tower 1) crashing into the South Tower (Tower 2), bringing both towers down and killing tens of thousands of people. It failed to do so but killed six people and injured ov The atta...


Basically, cow manure and petroleum iirc.

Read full topic
